translations: n.[法]拘留（arrest 的复数）；停止点；临界点
v.[法]逮捕；阻止（arrest 的单三形式）

sentences.sentence: Police chased the fleeing terrorists and later made two arrests.
sentences.translation: 警方追赶逃窜的恐怖分子，后来逮捕了两个人。

sentences.sentence: More than 50 arrests were made, mostly for drug-related offences.
sentences.translation: 超过五十人被捕，大部分是因为与毒品相关的犯罪。
